divs: Sighting DetailsTime: Approx. 12:15am Location: Hwy. 71 South heading north Viewed large shiny sphere above large cargo plane heading toward Fort Smith Airport. Plane was flying lower and lower appearing to begin landing approach or fly by. Silver orb was directly above the plane for several minutes and then vanished. Thought maybe weather balloon but it did not travel like one.
Summary: Silver orb or sphere tracking cargo plane
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Fort Smith
There were no other sightings in Fort Smith on or around May 16th 2011
